text: The Woman of the Iron Bracelets is a 1920 British silent crime film directed by Sidney Morgan and starring Eve Balfour, George Keene and Marguerite Blanche. ==Premise== A fleeing young woman facing a murder charge, goes to the assistance of a young man who is being cheated out of his inheritance by his stepfather. The iron bracelets of the title refer to her handcuffs. ==Cast== * Eve Balfour as Noah Berwell * George Keene as Harry St. John * Marguerite Blanche as Olive St. John * George Bellamy as Dr. Harvey * Arthur Walcott as Mr. Lawson * Alice De Winton as Mrs. Lawson ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael. The History of the British Film 1918-1929. George Allen & Unwin, 1971. ==External links== * Category:1920 films Category:British films Category:British crime drama films Category:British silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Sidney Morgan Category:1920 crime drama films Category:Films based on British novels Category:British black-and-white films Category:1920 drama films
title: The Woman of the Iron Bracelets
